channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Surprise, surprise: Silksong wins Steam’s Game of the Year
item.description: Valve has announced the winners of the 2025 Steam Awards and, unsurprisingly, Hollow Knight: Silksong, took home the Game of the Year honors. It was also given the "Best Game You Suck At" award, which, I'm not sure if that's a good thing or not. Given the relentless fawning over Silksong since its release in […]

item.title: A Newly Created Polymarket Account Made $436,759.61 on Nicolás Maduro’s Capture
item.description: Some people have all the luck.

item.title: California residents can use new tool to demand brokers delete their personal data
item.description: A new tool should make it easier for California residents to limit data brokers’ ability to store and sell their personal information.

item.title: What Happens Next in Venezuela—and the Rest of Latin America?
item.description: Donald Trump says that Venezuela's governance will remain in the hands of senior US officials until a "proper and judicious transition" can take place. The rest of the region is on notice.

item.title: Not exactly a DeepSeek moment for AI accelerators - but this Chinese optical chip may well be 100x faster than Nvidia's A100 on some tasks
item.description: Chinese photonic AI chips demonstrate extreme speed and energy efficiency in narrowly defined generative workloads, exceeding conventional GPU performance in lab tests.

item.title: You Must Stare Into the Heart of the $400 Million Machine
item.description: A riveting 55-minute YouTube video will show you where the GPU wafers come from.
